client.control

Class ExaminationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.control.ExaminationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, Initializable

    public class ExaminationController
extends Object
implements IController, Initializable
    ExaminationController is the Controller to the GUI of the view reference by the Lab worker, the Lab worker can see all the details of any reference he chose by date, specialist id, client id or by reference number.
    Author:
    Raz
